ComicInfo.Summary:
The past comes crashing into the present in this final exciting issue of the all-new Aspen mini-series, FATHOM: BLUE DESCENT! Worlds collide in this epic finale as the Blue and the ancient race of the Black set forth events that forever mark the Fathom Universe--including Aspen Matthews!
In his attempt to rescue his wife Eilah from the deadly clutches of Rahger and the Black, Abseloma may finally fill the missing void of patriarch for his fractured familyâ€¦or he will die trying. With FATHOM's return at hand, some new creators and several familiar names are coming along for the ride!
Taking charge of the writing chores is David Schwartz, known for his critically acclaimed Image Comics title Meltdown. Art duties for all of Aspen's curvaceous lines and intricate environments will be handled by Alex Sanchez of Spiderman Unlimited and JSA Classified fame. Together, this dynamic duo is looking forward to putting their stamp on FATHOM: BLUE DESCENT as never before! Over a decade's worth of answers spill out onto the pages of this exciting, all new FATHOM: BLUE DESCENT mini-series!
